name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PitchMeAI - Job Recruiter Email Finder & Free Resume Customizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 1-click extension to apply to jobs easily with a job recruiter email finder, a free AI-powered resume customizer, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What does PitchMeAI do?
We transform your job search on LinkedIn. With PitchMeAI, you can create personalized resumes, find recruiter email addresses, and send customized intro emailsâ€”all with just one click, directly from LinkedIn. 

Pricing:
***Free plan: You will get free credits every month - no credit card required to sign up and use the extension.
***Premium plan: Unlimited credits for resumes and intro emails and access to all features for $22/ month.

Key Features:
***Personalized resumes: Generate a resume tailored to each job opportunity on LinkedIn, including relevant keywords for better visibility. Download it in Word or PDF.
***Recruiter email finder: Seamlessly find the recruiter's or hiring manager's email address of ALL recruiters on LinkedIn job posts.
***Intro emails: Send the perfect intro email to capture attention and increase your hiring chances.

Benefits:
***Save time: No more hours spent applying for jobs and managing custom spreadsheets.
***Increase success: Boost your chances of landing job interviews with tailored resumes and emails.
***Streamline process: Manage your entire job search in one place, reducing information overload.

How to Use It:
1) Install PitchMeAI: Install the PitchMeAI Chrome Extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2) Generate resumes: Go to any LinkedIn job and create personalized resumes with relevant keywords for each job application.
3) Send emails to the recruiters : We find the hiring manager's email address effortlessly and craft and send customized intro emails to stand out to recruiters.

Get Started Now!

Land more job interviews and get hired faster with PitchMeAI. 

Install PitchMeAI today and take the next step in your career!
